links.label: Hangin' Out With Top Cat - An Interview With Arnold Stang by Walter J. Beaupre

infos.info: Hickerson writes that the program ';started out in New York in 9/21/40, ... (WOR) called Meet Mr. Morgan'; and was initially on Mutual known as Here's Morgan until 3/8/46. He also notes that the New York Times listed different days and times (Tuesday 8:30pm) for the period 9/3/46-10/15/46 than those listed in the broadcast history.
